content: schneeflocke hat by liz deane materials bulky yarn such as cascade 128 less than one skein of main color and much less than half a skein of the contrast color us 9 ~ 16 circular & dpns or size need to get gauge sizes s m l ~ m shown in photo finished dimensions 14 5 18 21 5 gauge 14 st = 4 instructions cast on 56 70 84 sts in main color on circular needle join to work in the round being careful not to twist place marker to indicate start of round work 1 1 1/2 2 in k1p1 rib knit 2 4 5 rounds in stockinette stitch knit every stitch work 13 row of chart white squares represent the main color grey squares are the contrast color after completing chart resume knitting stockinette stitch with main color knit until hat measures 6 6 1/2 7 from cast on edge begin crown decreases switching to dpns when necessary round 1 k5 k2tog repeat to end round 2 k4 k2tog repeat to end round 3 k3 k2tog repeat to end round 4 k2 k2tog repeat to end round 5 k1 k2tog repeat to end round 6 k2tog repeat to end break yarn and using a tapestry needle pull tail through the remaining loops on needles cinch tightly and weave in ends block wear happily all winter please use this pattern for personal or charitable purposes share freely modify improvise and make it your own
